[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [TextCanvas](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.md) &gt; [addTextBufferObject](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.addtextbufferobject.md)

## TextCanvas.addTextBufferObject() method

Adds a previously created \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] to the `TextCanvas`<!-- -->. Additional parameters can be provided to override the attributes stored in the buffer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addTextBufferObject(textBufferObject: TextBufferObject, params?: TextBufferAdditionParameters): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  textBufferObject | [TextBufferObject](./harp-text-canvas.textbufferobject.md) | \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] to add. |
|  params | [TextBufferAdditionParameters](./harp-text-canvas.textbufferadditionparameters.md) | Optional addition parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Result of the addition. If `false`<!-- -->, some error occurred during execution and the input text couldn't be properly added.
